review: I bought it strictly to access youtube for music videos and concerts.  I downloaded the app for free and have been very pleased with the product, but I don't use any of the other apps.  Don't have time for movies or games.  It did not work on my HDMI3 port on the TV but worked fine on the HDMI2 port. Don't know why.  Setup was painless and all worked fine.

review: if you're in the amazon eco system such as using kindles, kindle fire etc.  this is a low cost solution.  Does appear that Amazon is intentionally providing a higher quality prime video experience as other apps not amazon related tend to buffer when I know I have absolutely no other lag on my network and computers streaming not buffering at same time.  I then switch to an amazon prime video & buffering completely stops  I'm suspicious  however over a very good product for the price
